placeholder_select_item_left_column: Select an item from the left column.
placeholder_tap_search_icon_look_up_imag: Tap the search icon to look up an image.
placeholder_tap_search_icon_look_up_defi: Tap the search icon to look up a definition.
placeholder_no_challenge_submissions:
Everyone is still eating pizza.
Why don't you go first?
placeholder_no_co_authors: It is quiet over here. No co-authors found.
placeholder_every_great_story_starts_emp: Every great story starts with an empty sheet of paper...
placeholder_type_here_to_start_chapter: Type here to start your shiny new chapter...
placeholder_no_scenes_found:
No scenes found.
Create an outline before you write.
field_description_changes_previous_versi: Description of changes made in previous version:
pro_support_development_info: Fortelling is being built by a single developer. Buy them a coffee to keep them going.
pro_remove_ads_info: No more ads distracting from your plotting adventure. Full focus mode: activated!
pro_web_version_info: Access your worldbuilding from any device with a web browser. Use the app side-by-side with your desktop. Plot and write at the same time!
pro_custom_tools_info: Create your own tools to help you with your worldbuilding. Add custom fields to your story elements. Adjust the app to your unique writing process.
pro_cross_platform_subscription_info: Get all the benefits of the Pro version on all platforms. Use the web version on your desktop and the app on your phone. All in one subscription.
pro_monthly: M O N T H L Y
pro_yearly: Y E A R L Y
pro_export_your_writing_as_epub: Export your writing as EPUB and publish it anywhere you want.
info_what_to_do_with_this_item: What to do with this item?
info_restored_items_explanation: Restored items will be moved back to your original lists. Permanently deleted items can not be restored, ever.
info_are_you_sure_to_delete_this_item: Are you sure to delete this item?
info_you_wont_be_able_to_retrieve_it_aga: You won't be able to retrieve it ever again.
info_what_kind_of_a_writer_are_you: What kind of a writer are you?
info_deleted_projects_moved_archive_expl: Deleted projects are moved to the archive. You can access your archive from your account menu.
info_are_you_sure_to_delete_this_image: Are you sure to delete this image?
info_delete_image_explanation: You can, if it was not deleted, retrieve the image from your gallery.
info_labels_explanation: Organize the items (characters, locations, notes, etc.) in a structured way by labeling them. Give each label a unique color to recognize them easily. It is possible to re-use the labels over the different tools to remain consistent throughout the entire project.
info_not_necessary_reupload_explanation: It is not necessary to re-upload images. Please re-use already uploaded images from the gallery tab.
info_this_item_has_already_been_added_to: This item has already been added to this board.
info_private_save_option_challenges: Check this if you're not finished yet or want to keep this submission for yourself.
info_you_just_created_a_new_account:
You just created a new account, and that's awesome!
We would love to get to know you better.
info_receive_notifications_inbox: Receive notifications, tips and tricks in you inbox.
info_allows_to_see_all_story_elements: Allows to see all story elements. Always on.
info_allows_to_create_and_modify_story_e: Allows to create and modify story elements.
info_lets_wait_until_the_admin_accepts_y: Let's wait until the admin accepts your request.
info_your_request_has_been_sent_to_the_a: Your request has been sent to the admin. Please wait until your request gets approved.
info_your_request_got_denied: Your request got denied. If you want to re-submit your collaboration request, delete this request and enter the collaboration code again.
info_your_request_got_accepted: Your request got accepted! You can find the project at your home screen.
info_you_always_remain_owner: You always remain the owner of this project. Changes done by other users can not be undone.
info_code_is_case_sensitive: Code is case sensitive. Long press to copy.
info_waiting_for_answer_from_store: Waiting for an answer from the store.
info_you_wont_be_charged_anymore_time_le:
You won't be charged anymore.
Time left:
info_you_just_upgraded_to_pro: You just upgraded to Pro. Thank you very much!
info_cancelled_upgrade_contact_us: The upgrade process failed. Feel free to contact us when you are having trouble.
info_please_take_some_time_to_translate:
If you like this app, please take a little bit of your time to review it !
It really helps us and it shouldn\'t take you more than one minute.
info_are_you_sure_to_logout: Are you sure you want to logout? All your content will remain available on this and other platforms.
info_manage_which_devices_receive_notifi:
Manage on which active devices,
you will receive notifications.
info_open_communication_honest_feedback: Open communication and honest feedback allows us to build better tools for you. Feel free to approach us with your thoughts on the app. Let's plan, write and edit your next story together. Fortelling is shaped by its community. Fortelling is shaped by you.
info_how_to_use_image_gallery: How to use the image gallery?
info_image_gallery_explanation: All your uploaded images will get bundled in the image gallery. Whenever you need to re-use the image, you can simply select it form the gallery. No need to re-upload images.
info_choose_the_right_reason_help_proces: Choosing the right reason helps us process the report as soon as possible.
info_we_would_love_to_hear_from_you: We would love to hear from you!
info_this_is_already_your_current_versio: This is already your current version.
info_create_new_version_existing_chapter: Overwrite the latest version with the new content.
info_download_link_ready_saved_file:
There you go, your download link is ready.
We also saved the file on your device.
info_done_saved_file_to_device: Done! We saved this file to your device.
info_allow_creation_item_tree: Allow the creation of an item tree.
info_select_icon_for_list: Select an icon for the list.
info_sure_to_delete_custom_tool:
Are you sure you want to delete this tool? It will delete all data related to this tool. This also includes all the story elements you have created.

There is no way back after you press the button below.
info_only_applicable_on_first_category: Only applicable on the first tool of this category.
info_this_is_recurring_billing_cancel_an: This is a recurring billing and you can cancel anytime you want.
info_use_mobile_desktop_version_side_by_:
Use the mobile and the web version side-by-side to have the most optimal working environment.
Data will synchronize in real-time.
info_open_this_link_on_desktop: Open this link in your browser.
info_this_will_hide_your_account_from_se: This will hide your account from search.
info_report_submitted: Thank you for your report. We will review it and take appropriate action.
info_if_unlink_item_remains: If you unlink an item, this will not delete the original item.
info_lose_access_project: You will lose access to this project. To rejoin the project, you must send a new collaboration request.
info_new_challenge_published_on: A new challenge is published each Friday at 12 PM UTC
info_tap_on_element_to_create_link: Tap on an element to create a link.
info_explanation_hall_of_fame: Those who emerge as champions in the Author of the Month challenge will be forever honored in the hall of fame. Explore the winning entries for inspiration and participate in future contests.
info_this_item_could_not_be_loaded: This item could not be loaded.
info_please_wait_file_generating: Please wait, your file is generating...
info_done_we_saved_this_file_to_your_dev: Done! We saved this file to your device.
info_select_file_format_export_writing: Select the file format you want to export your writing to.
warning_alert_description_retrieve_from_: If you do delete it, you can always retrieve it from the trash.
warning_discard_message: Some changes have not been saved yet. If you leave, all the changes you made will go lost.
warning_to_confirm_permanent_deletion_ac: To confirm permanent deletion, activate toggle.
warning_you_are_not_the_owner: You are not the owner of this project.
warning_action_not_allowed: You are not allowed to perform this action.
warning_couldnt_load_images_due_to_error: Couldn't load images due to an error. Code:
warning_upload_error_image: The image was not uploaded due to an error.
warning_error_occurred: An error occured, please try again later.
warning_can_not_move_group_into_itself: Can not move group into itself.
warning_the_selected_item_not_connected_: The selected item can not be connected to this item.
warning_not_move_folder_into_itself: You can not move a folder into itself.
warning_you_can_not_move_an_element_into: You can not move an element into itself.
warning_no_spaces_or_special_characters_: No spaces or special characters allowed. (>3 characters)
warning_lets_get_creative_hackers: Let's get creative and not make it those hackers too easy!
warning_password_at_least_8_characters: Please enter a password of at least 8 characters
warning_are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
warning_if_you_do_delete_it_not_retrieve: If you do delete it, it can not be retrieved.
warning_you_are_about_to_send_the_admin_: You are about to send the admin of this project a collaboration request. Make sure this is the right project. Come back here to view the current status.
warning_please_check_if_you_entered_the_: Please check if you entered the right code. Ask the admin whether collaboration is enabled and if the project still exists.
warning_you_cannot_link_same_story_eleme: You cannot link the same story element to itself.
warning_function_still_under_development: This function is still under development.
warning_item_deleted_permanently_not_be_: This item will get deleted permanently, and can not be retrieved via the trash.
warning_category_needs_to_be_first_item_: A category needs to be the first item in the list.
warning_this_tool_not_customization_opti: This tool does not have any customization options.
warning_all_story_elements_category_dele: All story elements of this category will get deleted as well.
warning_all_fields_category_deleted_as_w: All fields of this category will get deleted as well.
warning_first_category_cant_be_deleted: First category can not be deleted.
warning_fields_are_added_to_category: Fields are added to a category.
warning_delete_account_info: The projects of which you are the admin will get deleted. Your challenge submissions will get deleted as well. If you delete your account, there is no way to restore this data.
warning_files_smaller_5_mb: Only files smaller then 5MB are allowed.
warning_removed_from_pinboard: This will remove this item from your board.
warning_elements_not_linked_boards: These elements can not be linked.
warning_internet_required_project_creati: An internet connection is required to create a new project.
promo_share: Check out Fortelling, this app helps you with writing a book: https://fortelling.app
